## sortBy() function

Sorts a list by the results of running each `array` value through an async `iterator`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function sortBy<T, U>(array: T[], iterator: AsyncListIterator<T, U>): Promise<T[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | T\[\] | The array to iterate on |
|  iterator | [AsyncListIterator](./promizr.asynclistiterator.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, U&gt; | The function which returns the sort index |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;T\[\]&gt;
